Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

Q:

How do I apply a low pass filter?

A:

Miles has a low-pass filter built directly into it's mixer. A low-pass filter allows only frequencies under a specified cut-off frequency to be heard.

To set a low-pass filter on a 2D sample, use AIL_set_sample_low_pass_cut_off.

To set a low-pass filter on a 2D stream, use AIL_set_stream_low_pass_cut_off.

Finally, for 3D samples, use the AIL_set_3D_sample_occlusion function.
